languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Не вижу причин отвергать столь щедрое предложение".
[Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Не вижу причин отвергать столь щедрое предложение".

languages.text: [微笑む]「そのような寛大な提案を断る理由などない」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「そのような寛大な提案を断る理由などない」

languages.text: [微微一笑]“我没有理由拒绝这慷慨的馈赠。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [微微一笑]“我没有理由拒绝这慷慨的馈赠。”

languages.text: [Sonreír] «No veo motivos para rechazar una oferta tan generosa».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «No veo motivos para rechazar una oferta tan generosa».

languages.text: [Sourire] « Je ne vois aucune raison de refuser une offre si généreuse. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « Je ne vois aucune raison de refuser une offre si généreuse. »

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Ich sehe keinen Grund, ein derart großzügiges Angebot abzulehnen."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Ich sehe keinen Grund, ein derart großzügiges Angebot abzulehnen."

languages.text: [Gülümse] "Böylesi cömert bir teklifi reddetmek için sebep göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "I see no reason to refuse such a generous offer."

traits.locale_text: [Gülümse] "Böylesi cömert bir teklifi reddetmek için bir sebep göremiyorum."
